file_content.text: The power core is strained to the breaking point. We can recharge the shields, but they still won't last long.
The power core's on its last legs. We can juice the shields back up, but they won't hold for long.
The hyperdrive has been completely burnt out.
Enemies on the bridge! Repeat, enemies on--
There are rudimentary backup controls here, but the enemy ships have us surrounded. We have few options left.
Then we save as many lives as we can.
Attention! Shields are failing, and the enemy has us surrounded.
Evacuate now, while you still can!
Then we take as many of them with us as we can.
